traits.name: Assassinate
entries: During its first turn, the Slayer has advantage on attack rolls against any creature that hasn't taken a turn. Any hit the Slayer scores against a surprised creature is a critical hit.

traits.name: Devil's Sight
entries: Magical darkness doesn't impede the Slayer's darkvision.

traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The Slayer has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The Slayer makes four Claw attacks.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 12 (2d6 + 5 damage) slashing damage plus 7 (2d6 damage) poison damage. The Slayer deals an extra 14 (4d6 damage) slashing damage when it has advantage on the attack roll and hits the target.
